translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The Direction of Order and Disorder, the Triad with Roots, the Text on the Direction of Order and Disorder
The Triad with Refuge, the Triad with Corruption

original: Saraṇaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Araṇaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo🔽naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: saraṇam saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  araṇam a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā araṇam asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ  na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: With a refuge, with corruption, with corruption as its root, a state that is a refuge, with corruption, its root, arises with root-cause as condition. As to root-cause, there is one triad. … As to not in conflict, there is one triad.🔽With no refuge, with no corruption, with no corruption as its root, a state that is a refuge, with no corruption, its root, arises with root-cause as condition. With no refuge, with no corruption, with no corruption as its root, a state that is a refuge,🔽with no corruption, its root, arises with root-cause as condition. As to root-cause, there are two triads. … As to kamma-result, there is one triad. … As to not in conflict, there are two triads.

original: Araṇaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With no refuge, with no corruption, with no corruption as its root, a state that is a refuge, with no corruption, its root, arises with root-cause as condition. As to root-cause, there is one triad. … As to not in conflict, there is one triad.
